stories.title: Previously Unpublished Emails of Satoshi Nakamoto Present a New Puzzle (2020)
Covid Patients fighting for their lives are still refusing the vaccine
I'm baking thousands of cookies and not letting anyone eat them
Hackers can bypass two-factor authentication security
Who can get a 3rd vaccine dose now–and who may be next
Vietnam, the Aftermath. Part IV: “Explain My Wound to Me.”

stories.text:
Hello

What cli tools do you use to capture your notes. For example, any vim packages that have improved your note taking process
stories.title: Ask HN: What commandline tools do you use to take notes?

stories.text:
If you or someone you know is a U.S. citizen in Afghanistan that wants to leave the country, have them fill out this [1] form.

If you or someone you know has an approved petition for a Special Immigrant Visa, email NVCSIV@state.gov or call 1-603-334-0828.

If you or someone you know worked as a contractor with U.S. forces, non-governmental organizations, or the media in Afghanistan, you can find information on the P-2 safe passage admissions program here [2].

If you are in the United States and wish to help people fleeing Afghanistan, you can sign up here [3] to volunteer for airport pickup, apartment setups, and/or meals for Afghans with the Lutheran Immigration and Refugee Service.

[1] https://forms.office.com/pages/responsepage.aspx?id=dFDPZv5a0UimkaErISH0S0jG7jCPVrpAs2b5YumFx6FUOUNBS0lPNFk1SjhEQzBRRDlXS0NXNFM1WCQlQCN0PWcu

[2] https://www.state.gov/u-s-refugee-admissions-program-priority-2-designation-for-afghan-nationals/

[3] https://lirsconnect.org/get_involved/action_center/siv

(all information and links sourced from a US legislator, mods can email me to verify)
stories.title: Tell HN: Resources for Those in Afghanistan Or Stateside Who Want To Help
Solutions to the same problem in as many different languages as possible
